data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_57eeea6d5bd8d21229de8df79751db9f.png

skilllist.skilldesc: <font color="a6aafb">Astral Spheres</font> summoned by Novaria will continuously slow nearby enemies by 20% and grant vision of them.

Novaria summons an <font color="a6aafb">Astral Sphere</font> at the target location, continuously dealing 75<font color="62f8fe"> (+25% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies. After 2s, the sphere will explode, dealing <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> equal to 260<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font> plus 4% of the enemy's Max HP to nearby enemies, and increasing <font color="a6aafb">Astral Sphere's</font> slow effect to 2.5 times the original slow effect.

Novaria summons an <font color="a6aafb">Astral Sphere</font> at a distance and draws it towards her. At the same time, Novaria gains 20% Movement Speed and can pass through terrain. Passing through a wall will increase the Movement Speed bonus to 60%.

When the <font color="a6aafb">Astral Sphere</font> reaches Novaria, she can cast <font color="a6aafb">Star Shatter</font> to launch it in a target direction within 5s. The sphere will explode when hitting an enemy hero, dealing <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> equal to 230<font color="62f8fe"> (+45% Total Magic Power)</font> plus 4% of the target's Max HP. The damage will increase based on the <font color="a6aafb">Astral Sphere's</font> travel distance (starting from when the sphere is summoned), up to 2.5 times the original damage.

Novaria scatters <font color="a6aafb">Astral Echo</font> in the target direction, briefly slowing enemy heroes hit by 50% while applying <font color="a6aafb">Astral Ring</font> on them, increasing their hitbox by 2.5 times and revealing their surrounding area. This effect lasts 5s.

data.name: Novaria

__data.skilldesc: Fire a Flaming Shot in the target direction, <font color="62f8fe">knocking back</font> nearby enemies and dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+0.5 Total Magic Power)</font>-680<font color="62f8fe"> (+1.7 Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> (scales with flying distance) to the first enemy hero or creep hit.
__data.skilldesc_text: Fire a Flaming Shot in the target direction, [C2knocking back] nearby enemies and dealing <Num1>-<Num2> [C1Magic Damage] (scales with flying distance) to the first enemy hero or creep hit.
__data.skilldescemblem: Fire a Flaming Shot in the target direction, <font color="62f8fe">knocking back</font> nearby enemies and dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font>-680<font color="62f8fe"> (+170% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> (scales with flying distance) to the first enemy hero or creep hit.

recommendmasterplan.description: Mid Lane: Extreme single-target burst. One shot, one kill.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+14 Adaptive Penetration
+10 Adaptive Attack
+3% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <Num1> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Penetration[-].########[8098ab]Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.[-]
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>

emblemskill.skilldesc: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Equipment can be purchased at <%Num1> of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage with skills deals 4% of target's Max HP as extra <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> and restores 2% Mana on hit.

<font color="8098ab">If the hero does not use Mana, recovers 1% HP instead. The extra Adaptive Damage dealt to non-hero units is up to 120</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 5s</font>
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage with skills deals <%Num1> of target's Max HP as extra [ffdfa2]Adaptive Damage[-] and restores <%Num2> Mana on hit.########[8098ab]If the hero does not use Mana, recovers <%Num4> HP instead. The extra Adaptive Damage dealt to non-hero units is up to <Num5>[-].########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num3>s[-]
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage with skills deals 4% of target's Max HP as extra <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> and restores 2% Mana on hit.

<font color="8098ab">If the hero does not use Mana, recovers 1% HP instead. The extra Adaptive Damage dealt to non-hero units is up to 120</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 5s</font>

equiplist.equipskill1: Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Magic Mastery: Max Cooldown Reduction is increased by 5%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.
Magic Mastery: Max Cooldown Reduction is increased by 5%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+50 Magic Power
+250 Extra Max HP
+20% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equiplist.equipskill1: Resonate: Every 6s, the next skill echoes, dealing <font color="62f8fe"> (+1.2 Total Magic Power)</font> extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies, speeding up the hero by 30%, which decays over 2s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Resonate: Every 6s, the next skill echoes, dealing <font color="62f8fe"> (+1.2 Total Magic Power)</font> extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies, speeding up the hero by 30%, which decays over 2s.

equiplist.equipskill1: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

equiplist.equipskill1: Guard: Gains a 800<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> Shield that will regenerate 20s after being damaged. The Shield also grants 30 Movement Speed while it lasts and 150 Movement Speed for 1s after it breaks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Guard: Gains a 800<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> Shield that will regenerate 20s after being damaged. The Shield also grants 30 Movement Speed while it lasts and 150 Movement Speed for 1s after it breaks.

recommendmasterplan.name: EVOS CLAWKUN
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

equiplist.equipskilldesc: Resonate: Every 6s, the next skill echoes, dealing <font color="62f8fe"> (+1.2 Total Magic Power)</font> extra Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies, speeding up the hero by 30%, which decays over 2s.

equiplist.equipskill1: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

equiplist.equipskill1: Guard: Gains a 800<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> Shield that will regenerate 20s after being damaged. The Shield also grants 30 Movement Speed while it lasts and 150 Movement Speed for 1s after it breaks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Guard: Gains a 800<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> Shield that will regenerate 20s after being damaged. The Shield also grants 30 Movement Speed while it lasts and 150 Movement Speed for 1s after it breaks.

recommendmasterplan.name: Chiilstreeam
recommendmasterplan.title: Influencer

data.story: The young girl who seeks to rebuild the Star Atlas in order to solve the secrets of the Stars.

assist.desc: Novaria works well with other long-range heroes like Beatrix and Layla because her Ultimate makes any target a sitting duck for her team to pick off.

strong.desc: Novaria counters Mages with shorter range and low mobility, such as Eudora and Odette, because these heroes can't reach Novaria while Novaria can hit them with her 2nd Skill.

weak.desc: Novaria is countered by Assassins with strong targeted burst damage, such as Saber and Hayabusa, because they can easily close in on Novaria and burst her down.
